thread.title: Glencore Reports Loss, Warns on Trading Profit
thread.title_full: Glencore Reports Loss, Warns on Trading Profit - WSJ

author: Alex MacDonald
title: Glencore Reports Loss, Warns on Trading Profit
text:
LONDON-- Glencore PLC has swung to a first half-year net loss and warned of less buoyant marketing earnings this year, showing how sharp falls in raw-material prices have tested the group’s hybrid mining and commodities-trading business model.
The world’s third largest globally diversified miner by market capitalization on Wednesday reported a net loss of $676 million in the six months to end-June--missing analysts’ expectations for...
